roleset.name: End entanglement, cause to be separate

role.descr: First (or all when one constituent) thing disentangled
Second thing arg1 is disentangled from (when separate constituent)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: As one designed to be a preacher of the gospel, he disentangled himself from the affairs of this life.
example.arg: As one designed to be a preacher of the gospel
from the affairs of this life

example.name: Patient as single constituent
example.text: He disentangled the threads of narration and reintegrated them into his own creation.
